title: Base
text: Base is a lower part of the microscope that provides stability and support .

title: Base
text: Base is refered to the lower part of the microscope that provides stability and support.

title: Base
text: The design and construction of the base can vary depending on the type and model of the microscope, ranging from a simple flat platform to more elaborate structures with integrated components.

title: Base
text: The base often contains the illumination system in microscopes equipped with built-in light sources, such as LED or halogen lamps.
